title: Blue Ezreal vs Juggernauts ?
body: Im just wondering how blue build ezreal do against juggernauts (Garen, Mordekaiser, Fiora,Darius, Skarner etc). For those who don't know what blue build Ezreal is here is the full item build {{item:3043}} {{item:3025}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3158}} {{item:3508}}. This build focus mostly around kiting and poking with Q and aoe slowing the enemies with iceborn gauntlet proc. Just wondering how will this build work against juggernauts.

replies.body:
"Might kite the f*ck out of these Juggernauts".

10/10 OP. 10/10.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EMdxLb3u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-13T07:31:56.675+0000)
>
> Fiora is NOT a juggernaut.

Well it doesn't matter much i guess because im referring to the OP champs right now which is {{champion:86}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:72}}
Despite the fact that they are not at all OP.
Skarner means you need a QSS in the build, otherwise yes it works fine (in other words don't blue ez into a skarner.)

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=EMdxLb3u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-13T07:35:07.443+0000)
>
> Skarner means you need a QSS in the build, otherwise yes it works fine (in other words don't blue ez into a skarner.)

Switching out the essence reaver for a {{item:3139}} will fix this then. But do you think Blue Ezreal will be good against the juggernauts especially after the rework of randuin's omen where it now reduces crit damage by 10% (Blue Ez doesn't rely much on crit) and the addition of {{item:3742}} to the game which made it difficult for range champions to kite melee champions.

The thing is i would actually say Blue ez can't be played against a skarner because of the fact that essence reaver is required as an item purchase and there is no way to actually build around that. (your going to run out of mana too damn fast with the required playstyle of blue ez.)

Honestly if you were going to switch out anything in that build it's the BotRK

Here is a link to the Ezreal builds pro's use.

http://www.probuilds.net/champions/Ezreal

And this is a link to one of the full builds that are more relevant

http://www.probuilds.net/guide/NA/1946321354/20239565

Of course against a skarner i would say you probably need to be picking up that QSS at the very least, earlier on (go Manamune> IBG/Triforce>QSS)

As a note there is no real need to fully upgrade the QSS till last.
